alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:08PM CDT until July 27 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 407 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pierce City, or near Monett, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monett... Aurora... Pierce City... Purdy... Verona... Pioneer... Freistatt... Pleasant Ridge... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 40 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
